encounters.name: Goblin
encounters.notes: Cowardly but cunning. Attacks in ambushes and flees at half HP.

encounters.name: Orc
encounters.notes: Aggressive and tribal. Charges the closest enemy and rarely retreats.

encounters.name: Troll
encounters.notes: Regenerates each round unless hit with fire or acid. Brutally strong.

encounters.name: Wandering Merchant
encounters.notes: Sells rare scrolls.  Will trade for information.

encounters.name: Drunk Bard
encounters.notes: Unpredictable and nosy.  May follow the party.
